basics.name: Ying Liu
basics.label: Engineer and Scientist
basics.summary: A Chinese MSc graduate in Denmark, experienced with AI in Medical Image Analysis, and passionate about translating research into applications.

work.name: Component AI
work.summary: Working on integrating AI into industrial manufacturing, together with the geometric algorithms.

work.name: Datalogisk Institut, KÃ¸benhavns Universitet
work.summary: Teaching at Palmer Physical Laboratory (now 302 Frist Campus Center). While not a professor at Princeton, I associated with the physics professors and continued to give lectures on campus.

education.area: Medical Image Analysis in Computer Science

references.name: Professor Stefan Sommer
references.reference: He is a super nice professor and offers a lot of help to me once I came to Denmark. He provides me with a TA position at his course and subsequently a AI Engineer position at Component AI.

references.name: Professor Jens Petersen
references.reference: He was a very patient professor and taught me a lot of knowledge about AI and Medical Image Analysis. He was the supervisor of my master thesis focused on Lung Cancer Radiotherapy.
